A quick fix

  * begin by searching for, or reporting your issue
    * help the community to help you — remember to state in your report:
      # the version of MacFUSE
      # the version of MacFusion
      # the version of Mac OS X
      # other basic information that will help us to understand your situation
    * remember that we have *two communities of users* — those using the very prominent *RELEASES*, and those using less prominent *BETA* versions of MacFusion.
